title: Sr. ML Engineer
description: About Us: Phi Consulting constructs innovation involving the most recent progressions in Information Technology. Working with industry-accredited clients who are positioned in the market as fastest growing fintech companies and listed in the Forbes 100. At Phi Consulting, we see our diligent effort compensated in remarkable ways consistently, and we acknowledge that knowledge is most integral when matched with lowliness. Weâ€™re roused by the chance to save lives out and about while affecting and working on each feature of numerous million-dollar enterprises that keep our actual economy moving. About Role: We are seeking an AI/ML Engineer to develop, deploy, and optimize AI-driven virtual agents, intelligent automation solutions, and machine learning models to enhance go-to-market (GTM) strategies, sales automation, and revenue operations. This role involves leveraging AI and NLP models to streamline customer interactions, automate sales processes, and develop predictive models for business optimization. The ideal candidate should have experience in AI-driven automation, LLM fine-tuning, NLP applications, and AI-enhanced workflow automation. Key Responsibilities: AI-Driven Virtual Agents & Automation The engineer will be responsible for developing and deploying AI-powered virtual agents to automate lead engagement, customer interactions, and workflow processes. This includes fine-tuning and integrating LLMs such as GPT, Claude, Llama, and Mistral to enhance conversational AI and intelligent decision-making. They will also implement NLP models for information retrieval, intent recognition, and response automation while utilizing open-source AI frameworks to develop scalable and cost-efficient AI solutions. GTM & Sales Process Optimization In addition to building intelligent agents, the role requires expertise in automating GTM and sales processes using AI. The engineer will leverage AI to automate lead qualification, customer segmentation, and data-driven engagement strategies. They will develop predictive models for sales forecasting, revenue growth, and pipeline optimization while implementing AI-driven workflow automation to improve operational efficiency. CRM integration with Salesforce, HubSpot, and Pipedrive will also be an essential part of the role. Machine Learning Model Development & Deployment Machine learning model development and deployment are crucial aspects of this role. The candidate should be able to build and optimize ML models for customer insights, sales optimization, and AI-driven process automation. They will deploy AI models using cost-efficient cloud platforms such as Google Vertex AI, AWS Bedrock, and Azure AI. Utilizing low-code/no-code AI solutions where applicable, they will develop rapid business automation tools while maintaining ML pipelines for continuous learning, model retraining, and performance optimization. Data-Driven Decision Making & Predictive Analytics Data-driven decision-making is at the core of the role. The AI/ML engineer will implement AI-driven forecasting models to predict conversion rates, customer engagement trends, and revenue growth. They will build custom AI-driven dashboards to provide real-time business intelligence and decision support while applying vector databases and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) models for intelligent search and knowledge retrieval. Optimization of AI models for real-time analytics and business performance tracking will also be a key responsibility. Required Skills & Experience AI/ML & NLP Expertise The ideal candidate should have hands-on experience in machine learning, NLP, and AI automation. They must be proficient in Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, OpenAI API, Hugging Face models, and related frameworks. Strong knowledge of fine-tuning and deploying LLMs for business applications is required, along with experience in workflow automation and AI-based customer engagement. Software Development & Integration Software development and integration skills are also important for this role. The candidate should have experience integrating AI models with CRM platforms, customer data systems, and enterprise automation tools. They should have a strong understanding of data pipelines, model deployment, and cloud-based AI infrastructure. Familiarity with AI orchestration tools such as LangChain, LlamaIndex, and vector databases will be an advantage. Business & GTM Process Knowledge Business and GTM process knowledge are highly preferred. The candidate should understand sales automation, marketing optimization, and AI-powered revenue strategies. They should also have experience in AI-driven business process automation and operational efficiency, as well as knowledge of customer engagement models and AI-enhanced personalization. Soft Skills Soft skills such as problem-solving and analytical thinking are essential, along with the ability to work cross-functionally with product, engineering, and revenue teams. The candidate should be adaptable to emerging AI trends, automation tools, and data-driven decision-making. AI-Powered Recommendation Engines & Decision Systems The candidate must have experience working with AI-powered recommendation engines and intelligent decision systems. They should be capable of developing models that enhance decision-making capabilities and automate business intelligence processes. Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) & Generative AI Expertise in RAG models, generative AI, and real-time AI applications is mandatory. The candidate should be proficient in implementing and fine-tuning these models for enhanced knowledge retrieval, response generation, and automation of content-driven workflows. Open-Source AI Solutions & Cost-Efficient Deployment The candidate must be knowledgeable about open-source AI frameworks and have experience deploying AI models using cost-efficient strategies. They should be able to optimize AI models for scalable and efficient performance while ensuring minimal operational costs. Why Join Us? This role offers the opportunity to work on AI-driven automation projects with real business impact. The candidate will gain exposure to cutting-edge AI/ML technologies and industry applications while collaborating with cross-functional teams focused on scalable AI-powered innovation. The work environment is flexible, with opportunities for remote or hybrid collaboration after first 6 months of employment.

title: Video Editor Internee
description: Job Title: Video Editor Intern (Hybrid â€“ Islamabad) Company: INQUEVATIVE â€“ A Creative Digital Agency About Us: INQUEVATIVE is a fast-growing digital agency established in 2025, founded by a team of passionate creatives with years of experience in videography, graphic design, UI/UX, and development. We are committed to building one of the strongest digital creative teams in Pakistan, delivering innovative solutions for local and global brands. Internship Overview: We are looking for a talented and motivated Video Editor Intern to join our creative team in Islamabad. This is a 45-day hybrid internship with a mix of in-office and remote work opportunities. Successful interns who align with our visual editing style and work ethic will be considered for a full-time role with a competitive salary. Responsibilities: * Assist in video production, editing, and post-production * Perform video color grading and basic motion graphics * Edit and enhance visual content for social media and digital platforms * Ensure high-quality video outputs that match the brandâ€™s visual direction * Collaborate with content creators, designers, and marketing team * Contribute ideas to improve the creative quality of projects Qualifications: * Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro) * Basic knowledge of color grading and motion graphics * Experience with graphic design tools (e.g., Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator) * Strong attention to detail and creative thinking * Good time management and organizational skills * Ability to work independently and within a team in a hybrid environment * Relevant coursework or experience in media production, film, or related fields is preferred Internship Duration: 45 Days zlocation : Islamabad (Hybrid â€“ some remote work allowed) Stipend: Details will be shared during the interview Potential for Full-Time: Yes â€“ based on performance and style compatibility

title: Data Engineer II, Marketing & Data Technology
description: About The Role Grade Level (for internal use): 09 The Role: Data Engineer II The Team: Our Data Engineering Team is a dynamic group of professionals dedicated to building innovative and scalable data solutions. We pride ourselves on our expertise in cloud technologies, particularly AWS and Snowflake, and our commitment to data security and governance. Our team thrives on collaboration, working closely with business and technical stakeholders to drive impactful data initiatives. We value continuous learning and are always exploring new technologies, such as AI-driven models and advanced data visualization tools, to enhance our data platforms and deliver exceptional results. The Impact: At S&P Global, we donâ€™t give you intelligenceâ€”we give you essential intelligence. The essential intelligence you need to make decisions with conviction. Weâ€™re the worldâ€™s foremost provider of credit ratings, benchmarks and analytics in the global capital and commodity markets. Our divisions include S&P Global Ratings, S&P Global Market Intelligence, S&P Dow Jones Indices and S&P Global Platts. For more information, visit www.spglobal.com. As part of this- you will be designing and implementing scalable data architectures that align with strategic objectives, enhancing overall business performance. Utilize your expertise in Snowflake, Python, and cloud technologies to ensure robust data security and integrity. Drive innovation by integrating AI-driven models and optimizing data workflows, thereby improving data processing efficiency and supporting informed decision-making across the organization. Whatâ€™s in it for you: As a Data Engineer, you will be at the forefront of transforming our data landscape, playing a crucial role in shaping the future of our data-driven strategies. Engage in exciting projects that leverage cutting-edge technologies like AI and cloud platforms to optimize data operations. Benefit from a collaborative and innovative work environment that encourages professional growth and values your contributions to achieving strategic goals. Enjoy opportunities to expand your skills and make a significant impact on our organization's success. Our Marketing & Data Technology department at S&P Global is dedicated to driving innovation and ensuring the seamless integration and management of data across our commercial and marketing platforms. Our team values collaboration, continuous learning, and a commitment to excellence. We pride ourselves on our ability to adapt quickly to technological advancements and our focus on delivering high-quality data solutions to our clients. Responsibilities Design and implement scalable and efficient data systems, ensuring robust data architecture. Develop innovative data products that align with business goals and enhance data accessibility. Ensure data integrity and confidentiality through expert application of data security and encryption protocols. Leverage cloud technologies, particularly AWS, to optimize data operations and enhance performance. Implement and manage RBAC security models within Snowflake to maintain secure data environments. Collaborate across business and technical teams to ensure effective communication and project delivery. Manage large-scale data projects from inception to completion, ensuring timely and successful outcomes. Required Skills Bachelorâ€™s degree in software engineering, Computer Science, or a related field, or 5+ years of experience in data engineering. 5+ years of experience working with Snowflake in a data engineering capacity. Strong proficiency in data architecture and demonstrated experience in data product development. Advanced proficiency in Python and SQL for data transformation and analytics. Deep understanding of RBAC security models and secure data connection protocols (JDBC, ODBC, etc.). Excellent communication skills for effective collaboration across diverse teams. Exposure to systems integrations for seamless data interoperability. Proficiency in query optimization and algorithmic efficiency. Preferred Qualities Knowledge of machine learning for integrating basic models into data processes. Strong collaborative skills and the ability to work effectively in team-oriented environments. Experience with Cortex AI, LLM tools, and developing Streamlit applications. Familiarity with data governance, security, and compliance best practices. Certifications in Snowflake, data engineering, or related fields. Experience with data visualization tools like Tableau or Power BI, and ELT/ETL tools such as Informatica. # Whatâ€™s In It For You? Our Purpose Progress is not a self-starter. It requires a catalyst to be set in motion. Information, imagination, people, technologyâ€“the right combination can unlock possibility and change the world. Our world is in transition and getting more complex by the day. We push past expected observations and seek out new levels of understanding so that we can help companies, governments and individuals make an impact on tomorrow. At S&P Global we transform data into Essential IntelligenceÂ®, pinpointing risks and opening possibilities. We Accelerate Progress. Our People We're more than 35,000 strong worldwideâ€”so we're able to understand nuances while having a broad perspective. Our team is driven by curiosity and a shared belief that Essential Intelligence can help build a more prosperous future for us all. From finding new ways to measure sustainability to analyzing energy transition across the supply chain to building workflow solutions that make it easy to tap into insight and apply it. We are changing the way people see things and empowering them to make an impact on the world we live in. Weâ€™re committed to a more equitable future and to helping our customers find new, sustainable ways of doing business. Weâ€™re constantly seeking new solutions that have progress in mind. Join us and help create the critical insights that truly make a difference. Our Values Integrity, Discovery, Partnership At S&P Global, we focus on Powering Global Markets. Throughout our history, the world's leading organizations have relied on us for the Essential Intelligence they need to make confident decisions about the road ahead. We start with a foundation of integrity in all we do, bring a spirit of discovery to our work, and collaborate in close partnership with each other and our customers to achieve shared goals. Benefits We take care of you, so you can take care of business. We care about our people. Thatâ€™s why we provide everything youâ€”and your careerâ€”need to thrive at S&P Global. Our Benefits Include Health & Wellness: Health care coverage designed for the mind and body. Flexible Downtime: Generous time off helps keep you energized for your time on. Continuous Learning: Access a wealth of resources to grow your career and learn valuable new skills. Invest in Your Future: Secure your financial future through competitive pay, retirement planning, a continuing education program with a company-matched student loan contribution, and financial wellness programs. Family Friendly Perks: Itâ€™s not just about you. S&P Global has perks for your partners and little ones, too, with some best-in class benefits for families. Beyond the Basics: From retail discounts to referral incentive awardsâ€”small perks can make a big difference. For more information on benefits by country visit: https://spgbenefits.com/benefit-summaries Global Hiring And Opportunity At S&P Global At S&P Global, we are committed to fostering a connected and engaged workplace where all individuals have access to opportunities based on their skills, experience, and contributions. Our hiring practices emphasize fairness, transparency, and merit, ensuring that we attract and retain top talent. By valuing different perspectives and promoting a culture of respect and collaboration, we drive innovation and power global markets. Equal Opportunity Employer S&P Global is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race/ethnicity, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, marital status, military veteran status, unemployment status, or any other status protected by law. Only electronic job submissions will be considered for employment. If you need an accommodation during the application process due to a disability, please send an email to: EEO.Compliance@spglobal.com and your request will be forwarded to the appropriate person. US Candidates Only: The EEO is the Law Poster http://www.dol.gov/ofccp/regs/compliance/posters/pdf/eeopost.pdf describes discrimination protections under federal law. title: AM Regulatory Reporting & Analytics
description: We're Hiring: Assistant Manager â€“ Regulatory Reporting & Analytics Location: Islamabad | ğŸ¦ Department: Customer Experience Experience: 4â€“6 years in Quality Assurance (Banking) Education: MBA / Masterâ€™s in a relevant field Are you passionate about regulatory compliance, customer service excellence, and data-driven insights? HBL Microfinance Bank is seeking a skilled and motivated Assistant Manager â€“ Regulatory Reporting & Analytics to join our Customer Experience team. In this impactful role, youâ€™ll support the design, monitoring, and enhancement of our customer service and complaint management frameworks, ensure timely regulatory reporting, and contribute to a consistent service culture across our nationwide branch network. Key Responsibilities: Complaint & Service Quality Management: Design and execute complaint management processes and service quality frameworks Oversee complaint resolution standards and ensure automation for efficiency Monitor customer touchpoints and promote service consistency across branches MIS & Reporting: Analyze customer feedback and complaints for strategic reporting Prepare reports for SBP and internal stakeholders Conduct root cause analysis and drive process improvements Regulatory Reporting: Ensure accurate and timely submission of data to SBP and other authorities Liaise with regulators to manage externally initiated complaints Training & Development: Conduct training needs assessments and help design CX-related training modules Facilitate training sessions to build service excellence Record Keeping & Governance: Maintain organized records and support audits/compliance reviews Perform additional duties assigned by competent authorities Your Skills & Expertise: Strong understanding of quality management principles Proficient in MS Excel and financial modeling Sharp analytical and reporting skills Excellent time management and stakeholder coordination Willingness to travel as per business needs

7.é€‚åº”èƒ½åŠ›ï¼šèƒ½å¤Ÿé€‚åº”é•¿æœŸå‡ºå·®å’Œä¸åŒåœ°åŒºçš„å·¥ä½œç¯å¢ƒï¼Œå…·å¤‡è¾ƒå¼ºçš„æŠ—å‹èƒ½åŠ›å’Œåº”å˜èƒ½åŠ›ã€‚ è”ç³»æ–¹å¼ï¼šæˆ‘çš„å¾®ä¿¡ï¼š863474509 Job Responsibilities Market Development and Customer Expansion Deeply understand the market dynamics, policies, regulations, and competitive landscapes of the energy storage markets in Europe, the Middle East, North and South Africa, Brazil, and Pakistan. Develop and implement targeted market development strategies to increase the company's product market share in local areas. Explore potential customers through various channels, including but not limited to energy companies, photovoltaic power plant developers, industrial and commercial enterprises, and distributors. Establish and maintain good customer relationships, conduct regular follow - up visits to customers, understand their needs and feedback, and provide high - quality pre - sales and after - sales services. Sales Business Execution : Be responsible for the sales of the company's energy storage products (including components, systems, etc.) in the designated regions, and achieve personal sales targets and team sales tasks. Provide professional energy storage solutions and product quotations according to customer needs, participate in business negotiations, sign sales contracts, and ensure the smooth execution of contracts and the timely recovery of payments. Coordinate internal company resources, including R & D, production, logistics and other departments, to ensure the timely delivery, installation, and commissioning of products, and provide customers with one - stop energy storage solutions and service support. Market Research and Analysis Regularly collect, collate, and analyze local energy storage market information, including market demand, competitors' products and prices, and industry trends. Write market research reports to provide a reference basis for company decision - making. Pay attention to changes in local policies and regulations, promptly feedback relevant information to the company, assist the company in formulating response strategies, and make full use of policy opportunities to promote business development. Team Collaboration and Communication Collaborate closely with other departments of the company, including R & D, technical support, and marketing, to jointly promote the development of the company's energy storage business. Timely feedback customer needs and market information, assist the R & D department in optimizing product performance and functions, and improve the market competitiveness of products. Participate in sales meetings, training courses, and marketing promotion activities organized by the company, share sales experience and market information, and grow and progress together with team members. Job Requirements Educational Background : A bachelor's degree or above, with a preference for majors related to marketing, electrical engineering, energy management, etc. Work Experience : Have more than 2 years of sales experience in energy storage products, and those with sales experience in the markets of North and South Africa, Brazil, Pakistan, etc. are preferred. Professional Knowledge : Be familiar with the technical principles, performance parameters, and application scenarios of energy storage products, and understand the development dynamics and trends of new energy industries such as photovoltaics and wind power. Language Ability : Have good English listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills, and be able to communicate fluently with local customers. It is better if you have local language skills (such as Portuguese, Arabic, Urdu, etc.). Communication Skills : Have excellent communication skills and business negotiation abilities, and be able to effectively communicate and coordinate with customers, partners, and internal company teams. Market Development Ability : Have a strong sense and ability of market development, be able to independently conduct market research and customer development work, and formulate effective sales strategies and plans. Teamwork Spirit : Have a good teamwork spirit, be able to support and collaborate with team members to jointly complete sales tasks. Adaptability : Be able to adapt to long - term business trips and different working environments, and have strong stress resistance and adaptability. Contact Information: My WeChat: 863474509
